allVersions.changelog: Now working on linux. Minor bug fixes for windows/linux.
New Interface and too many new features to list here. Please Update.
Fixed dashboard error on linux
Fixed player chart, onesync detection, and minor stuff
Fixed crashing on fxserver restart.
Hotfix for the login problems. Node version checker

New Settings Page and setup script. Changed how server profiles work.
Please read update instructions on discord.
Now saving the server log and showing it when you open the Live Console. Added a button to download the log below the console.
Scheduled restarts announcements 15 minutes before. Discord announcements on server start/stop/restart.
Admin Accounts Manager page.
Permissions System.
Resource Injector.
Improved restarter behaviour. Minor bug fixes.
Kicking players 15 seconds before scheduled restarts.
Fixed commands.resources permission with the wrong name.
Minor bug fixes and improved some settings descriptions and error messages.
Added beta support for HTTPS/SSL. Added kick reason. Minor bug fixes.
Added translation support for Chat/Discord messages.
Quickfix for Linux instances.
Added a resources page. Added Czech, Romanian and German translations.
Added Server Activity Log (BETA). Added Discord command spam protection. Added more languages. Bug fixes.
Fixed resource injection for new installations.
Fixed error 413. Multiple bug fixes and improvements.
Optimized txAdmin (40% less dependecies). Improved some pages on Mobile.
Added option to change own password.
Reorganized some internal files.
Process freeze detector.
Scripting setup now via exec file instead of stdin.write.
New Experimental Ban System!
Quickfix: solved empty list issue with ban system
